quotes.quote: Courage is the price that Life exacts for granting peace.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Courage is not simply one of the virtues , but the form of every virtue at the testing point.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Live as brave men; and if fortune is adverse, front its blows with brave hearts.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Courage is the ladder on which all the other virtues mount.
quotes.author: Clare Booth Luce

quotes.quote: The bravest thing you can do when you are not brave is to profess courage and act accordingly.
quotes.author: Corra Harris

quotes.quote: Courage is fear that has said its prayers.
quotes.author: Dorothy Bernard

quotes.quote: I would rather be a coward than brave because people hurt you when you are brave.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.quote: Courage is doing what you're afraid to do. There can be no courage unless you're scared.
quotes.author: Eddie Rickenbacker

quotes.quote: Few men are willing to brave the disapproval of their fellows, the censure of their colleagues, the wrath of their society. Moral courage is a rarer commodity than bravery in battle or great intelligence. Yet it is the one essential, vital quality of those who seek to change a world which yields most painfully to change
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: A coward turns away, but a brave man's choice is danger.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Courage is the art of being the only one who knows you're scared to death.
quotes.author: Harold Wilson

quotes.quote: I wanted you to see what real courage is, instead of getting the idea that courage is a man with a gun in his hand. It's when you know you're licked before you begin but you begin anyway and you see it through no matter what.
quotes.author: Harper Lee

quotes.quote: A timid person is frightened before a danger, a coward during the time, and a courageous person afterward.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Richter

quotes.quote: The stories of past courage can define that ingredient-they can teach, they can offer hope, they can provide inspiration. But they cannot supply courage itself. For this each man must look into his own soul.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Courage and perseverance have a magical talisman, before which difficulties disappear and obstacles vanish into air.
quotes.author: John Quincy Adams

quotes.quote: Courage is being scared to death - but saddling up anyway.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.quote: The worst thing of all is standing by when folks are doing something wrong.
quotes.author: Lawana Blackwell

quotes.quote: If courage wasn't a standard result of aging, it meant that the young could somehow acquire it as well.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear - not absence of fear.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: It is curious that physical courage should be so common in the world and moral courage so rare.
quotes.author: Menander

quotes.quote: Let bravery be thy choice, but not bravado.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: The strongest, most generous, and proudest of all virtues is true courage.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The only courage that matters is the kind that gets you from one moment to the next.
quotes.author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan

quotes.quote: A hero is no braver than an ordinary man, but he is braver five minutes longer.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: When you meet your antagonist, do everything in a mild and agreeable manner. Let your courage be as keen, but at the same time as polished, as your sword.
quotes.author: Terence

quotes.quote: Keep your fears to yourself, but share your courage with others.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Fortune helps the brave.

Far better is it to dare mighty things, to win glorious triumphs, even though checkered by failure , than to take rank with those poor spires who neither enjoy much nor suffer much because they live in the gray twilight that knows not victory or defeat.
